settings.heading: Discover The Art of Mindful Self Care at Therapy Day Spa

settings.text: We warmly invite you to our mindful spa nestled in the serene village of Pererenan, just a breath away from vibrant Canggu in beautiful Bali. At our sanctuary, we believe in the transformative power of plant derived, toxin and cruelty free spa rituals to elevate your well-being and self-care journey. Our ethos is rooted in the conscious creation of experiences that harmonize mind, body and soul, inviting you to embrace a more sustainable and holistic approach to self-care.

Our highly skilled and nurturing therapists intuitively guide you towards inner balance and rejuvenation as you indulge in a spectrum of offerings, from soothing massages to invigorating scrubs, blissful facials, and holistic reflexology sessions. Our thoughtfully curated treatments are intended to deepen your connection with your inner self.

custom_css: .media > img {object-fit: cover; object-position: center 84%; transition: opacity 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94);}

settings.heading: cream bath
settings.description: Embark on a truly Balinese experience by indulging in the luxurious tradition of a Cream Bath ritual. Not to be missed on your Bali itinerary, this experience encompasses a blissful combination of rich heritage and modern hair care. Our carefully curated hair mask, free from harmful toxins, blends the hydrating properties of aloe vera, the nourishing essence of avocado extracts and the replenishing power of squalane to deeply nourish every strand. Relax as you enjoy a soothing head massage, ensuring your hair is treated with utmost care and respect, leaving your crown feeling rejuvenated.
settings.book-now-message: message when i clicked on cream bath

settings.heading: scalp ritual
settings.description: Surrender to a holistic experience with our transformative botanical journey and embody the revitalizing spirit of our plant-powered, toxin-free Scalp Ritual. Let our skilled therapists melt away tension in your neck, head and shoulders by reactivating blood circulation. Infused with a soothing fusion of avocado and ginseng extracts, our potent elixir nurtures your scalp naturally for a renewed sense of well-being and healthier hair.

settings.heading: scalp ritual (oil free)
settings.description: Let our skilled therapists work their magic as they gently massage your scalp, relieving tension and promoting relaxation. This oil-free treatment is designed to enhance blood circulation and ease headaches, leaving you refreshed and rejuvenated.

settings.heading: quick glow
settings.description:
Indulge in a rejuvenating Express Facial Massage, designed for those seeking a quick retreat from their daily hustle or for individuals looking to experience the soothing benefits of facial massage for the first time. 

Our expert therapists will gently stimulate circulation in your facial, neck and head regions, as delicate strokes and gentle pressure work to revitalize your skin and invigorate your senses. It is a perfect introduction to the world of facial treatments, offering a glimpse into the transformative power of touch and skincare techniques while highlighting the benefits of using plant-based, toxic-free products. Allow yourself a moment of relaxation and self-care as you unwind and let the worries of the day fade away.

settings.heading: sparkling iceballs
settings.description:
Indulge in our luxurious plant derived, toxic free Pressure Point Facial Massage, a revitalizing spa ritual specifically designed to rejuvenate your skin and relax your mind. This therapeutic facial massage targets key pressure points on the face, promoting increased circulation and stimulating relaxation to enhance your overall well-being. During the treatment, our skilled therapists will expertly apply gentle pressure to specific points on your face to help release tension and revitalize your skin. By activating these pressure points, the massage encourages improved blood flow, which can promote a healthy, radiant complexion.

To conclude this exquisite experience, iceballs are delicately glided over your skin. The cooling sensation of the ice helps to soothe any inflammation, reduce puffiness and further invigorate your senses. This refreshing final touch leaves you feeling rejuvenated and with a radiant glow.

settings.heading: natural dreams
settings.description:
Embark on a rejuvenating journey with our non-invasive traditional cleansing facial that harnesses the potent benefits of plant-derived ingredients, entirely free from toxins. This comprehensive facial experience incorporates the goodness of Sacha Inchi & Moringa oil, Jicama, Avocado & Calendula extracts and Cyprus & Bergamot essential oils.

Enjoy a serene escape as your skin is treated to a purifying cleanse, a tranquil facial massage, gentle exfoliation scrub, and a decadent nourishing mask. Designed to be gentle yet effective, our non-invasive approach ensures your skin receives the utmost care and attention without harsh treatments. 

Surrender to the calming scents and rejuvenating touch of our botanical treasures as your complexion is revitalized, leaving you with a fresh, radiant glow. Immerse yourself in the pure essence of nature with this holistic facial experience that respects and nurtures your skin with the finest plant-based ingredients.

settings.heading: the healing act
settings.description:
Experience a blend of traditional Balinese body massage techniques, including soothing rhythmic strokes that promote inner relaxation. Our specially formulated plant-based massage oil infused with calming notes of rose, black pepper & frankincense essential oils not only cater to specific benefits like relaxation, cleansing and tension release but also provide a host of nurturing elements for your skin. Perfect for relieving stress, muscle discomfort, sleep issues and anxiety. Let your mind wander into a state of peaceful reflection as your body and soul synchronize in harmony with Tri Hita Karana – a Balinese philosophy emphasizing the unity of individuals, nature and spirituality.

For an extended journey, opt for the 90-minute session, which begins with a luxurious 10 minute Foot Ritual followed by an 80 minute immersive treatment to enhance your relaxation experience.

settings.heading: the panel beat
settings.description:
Unleash the ultimate rejuvenating experience with The Panel Beat, a massage technique that sets the benchmark for deep tissue therapy. Calibrate your body's rhythm as you surrender to the transcendent power of this massage, meticulously crafted to unlock persistent muscle tension and restore your body's vitality. Ideal for surf enthusiasts looking to unwind after a day of exhilarating barrel rides.

Our plant-based massage oil, infused with gandapura, ginger, black pepper and palmarosa essential oils, creates a harmonious blend of scents that elevate the therapeutic effects, promoting deep relaxation, muscle recovery and holistic well-being. Let the stresses of the day dissolve as you embrace the rejuvenating powers of this transformative massage.

Indulge in a 90-minute session for an extended journey into relaxation. Commencing with a lavish 10 minute Foot Ritual, the experience transitions seamlessly into an 80 minute treatment that will immerse you in a state of absolute restoration.

settings.heading: the ultimate euphoria
settings.description:
Allow us to calm your senses with our gentle yet deeply relaxing bespoke signature body massage, meticulously crafted with plant-derived non-toxic ingredients sourced exclusively from within the Indonesian archipelago. Enhanced with nourishing Moringa and Sacha Inchi oils, this massage is infused with the aromatic essences of lemongrass, turmeric, nutmeg and eucalyptus essential oils, all derived from the abundant flora of the region. Immerse yourself in the harmonious blend of these natural Indonesian treasures, guiding you into a state of blissful tranquility. Ease muscle tension and detoxify your body while your mind luxuriates in the therapeutic warmth of a comforting back and neck heating pad. 

Your experience begins with a luxurious foot ritual, followed by an indulgent 80-minute treatment, ensuring a truly revitalizing journey from the heart of Indonesia.

settings.heading: back in harmony
settings.description: Experience the ultimate indulgence with our tailored therapeutic massage, meticulously crafted to target tension and tightness in your back, shoulders and neck. Whether you are desk-bound, a surfing enthusiast or a weary traveler seeking relief, this specialized treatment is expertly designed to dissolve stress and promote relaxation under the skilled hands of our therapists. Infused with our premium, plant-based oils free of harsh chemicals, this luxurious session guarantees a deeply revitalizing experience, leaving you feeling invigorated and renewed.

settings.heading: the mum to be
settings.description: Experience the soothing comfort of our specially curated Pregnancy Massage, expertly delivered by our skilled and caring therapists. Featuring our luxurious plant-based oils, specifically crafted for their gentle and safe formula, this treatment is tailored to alleviate the discomforts of pregnancy and promote relaxation. Trust in our dedicated team to provide a nurturing and rejuvenating experience that prioritizes your well-being and the safety of both you and your baby.

settings.heading: a salty ritual
settings.description:
Indulge in a truly Balinese spa experience with our Sea Salt Scrub ritual. Enriched with local calendula flowers and hand-harvested Balinese sea salt from the village of Kusumba, renowned for its salt-making tradition, this ritual offers holistic renewal of your skin. The soothing properties of Balinese calendula combined with the mineral-infused Kusumba Sea Salt will elevate your skin's luminosity by gently exfoliating to unveil a radiant complexion that embodies the beauty of Bali.

Our salt scrub is meticulously crafted without harmful toxins, inviting you to embrace mindful self-care inspired by Balinese wellness practices. Every element, including the premium sea salt and locally sourced marigold, embodies the essence of an authentic Balinese spa ritual, ensuring a renewed sense of sublime. 

Your spa ritual begins with a luxurious foot ritual, followed by a 50-minute body scrub featuring a momentary face and scalp massage. Our nurturing therapists will conclude the ritual by applying a nourishing body moisturizer, ensuring your skin exudes radiance and feels soft. 

Unsuitable for sensitive skin.

settings.heading: botanical bliss
settings.description:
Embark on a sensory journey with our Indonesian-inspired Sugar Scrub Ritual, featuring an exotic blend of locally sourced ingredients that capture the essence of Indonesia's rich botanicals. This luxurious scrub showcases the star ingredients of our archipelago – Moringa oil, lemongrass, nutmeg, turmeric and eucalyptus essential oils – known for their aromatic and healing properties.

Moringa oil deeply nourishes and moisturizes, while lemongrass and eucalyptus essential oils invigorate the senses with their refreshing scents. The warm notes of nutmeg and the healing properties of turmeric work together to promote healthy, glowing skin. Our sugar-based scrub is mindfully formulated to be plant powered and toxic-free so you can indulge in peace. 

This 60 minute indulgence begins with a 10 minute Foot Ritual to soothe your senses, followed by a 50-minute treatment. Immerse yourself in the rejuvenating power of local botanicals and emerge with soft, glowing skin that reflects the beauty of our Indonesian archipelago.

Suitable for sensitive skin

settings.heading: awaken your senses
settings.description:
Indulge in our Luxe Botanical Body Mask Ritual, a rejuvenating spa experience that harnesses the power of locally sourced plant-derived, toxin-free ingredients to pamper your skin.

Kaolin detoxifies and purifies the skin, while Moringa and coconut cream powder deeply nourish and hydrate, leaving your skin soft and supple.

Avocado and Centella extracts boost collagen production and promote skin elasticity, revealing a firmer, more youthful complexion. The soothing properties of aloe vera extract calm and rejuvenate the skin, while lemongrass, turmeric, nutmeg and eucalyptus essential oils provide a refreshing, invigorating scent to enhance your spa experience.

Unwind as the mask works its magic, revitalizing your skin and restoring its natural radiance. Treat yourself to this luxurious botanical escape and emerge with glowing, revitalized skin that radiates health and vitality. Begins with a 10 minute Foot Ritual to soothe your senses, followed by a 50-minute treatment.

Suitable for sensitive skin.

settings.heading: relaxology
settings.description:
Indulge in our Calming Foot Massage, a blissful experience tailored for relaxation enthusiasts. Our skilled therapists will envelop you with gentle, soothing strokes, designed to alleviate tension in your feet and lower legs. Enhancing this experience is our specially crafted hydrating foot butter, a luxurious blend of shea butter, rosemary and lemon essential oils, designed to deeply moisturize and revitalize your skin, leaving you feeling refreshed and balanced from toe to heel.

For an indulgent journey, select the 90-minute session that commences with a luxurious 10-minute Foot Ritual, leading into an 80-minute immersive treatment to enhance your relaxation experience.

settings.heading: natural dreams
settings.description: Treat yourself to a rejuvenating luxury facial that embraces the healing properties of nature’s most hydrating ingredients. Our exquisite treatment is carefully crafted with plant-based, toxic-free elements, such as Avocado oil, Moringa Oil, Frankincense, and Turmeric. This all-encompassing facial experience encompasses a gentle scrub for exfoliation, a nourishing mask for revitalization, and a refreshing toner to complete the ritual. Immerse yourself in the beauty of a facial that cares for your skin with utmost purity, leaving you with a natural, radiant glow.

settings.heading: therapeutic
settings.description: Revitalize your nails with our Therapeutic Plant-Based Manicure, a wellness-focused experience that embraces the power of nature. We prioritize your well-being by using only plant-based, non-toxic products throughout the treatment. Our skilled technicians expertly shape and buff your nails, ensuring a flawless result. Indulge in a gentle exfoliation that leaves your hands feeling velvety smooth, using plant-based ingredients to nourish and renew your skin. Choose (or not) from our collection of stunning nail polishes, all made from plant-based formulas that are free from harmful chemicals. Relax and unwind with a soothing hand massage using our specially crafted, plant-based hand cream, enriched with botanical extracts for deep hydration. Experience the perfect harmony of wellness and nature with our Therapeutic Plant-Based Manicure, where your health and the environment are our top priorities.

settings.heading: two slices of heaven
settings.description:
Choice of 60 minute massage and choice of body scrub. Indulge in body massage followed by an exhilarating body scrub leaving your skin exfoliated and velvety smooth – a true revelry in relaxation.
Begins with 10 min Foot Ritual followed by 95 min treatment.

settings.heading: gift voucher
settings.description: THERAPY gift vouchers make perfect gifts for any occassion. Available in any denomination. Please enquire within.
